moapi.api

Class ModTextOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • moapi.api.ModOption<java.lang.String>
      • moapi.api.ModTextOption

  • public class ModTextOption
extends ModOption<java.lang.String>
    A text input field option for modoptionsapi with customisable maximum length

    0.7
